original_text: Then Jehoram went forth with his princes, and all his chariots with him: and he rose up by night, and smote the Edomites which compassed him in, and the captains of the chariots.
korean_text: 여호람이 지휘관들과 모든 병거를 거느리고 출정하였더니 밤에 일어나서 자기를 에워싼 에돔 사람과 그 병거의 지휘관들을 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoram went forth with his princes
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호람이 그의 방백들과 함께 나아가고

sentences.original_text: and all his chariots with him:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 전차가 그와 함께 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and he rose up by night,
and the captains of the chariots.
